text:
Hello Team,
Anyone tell me SMS channel feature is available in HubSpot?
if yes then send me url and docs.
I am attempting to use API with HubSpot Custom Objects. Has anyone attempted this integration before?
I built a sites custom object. Sites is the specific locations we service. I need multiple site records that will be associated to a deal to be sent onto the  pandadoc document.

Hi! I am needing to bulk update line items that are already associated to a deal. I was passed alone this end point, <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/line-items/update-line-item>. However, i'm unsure how to continue. I am wanting to assign a tags to the line item. I've already updated the product in HubSpot. However, it will not update line items already existing inside of a deal
Once a deal is created and the sites are associated to that deal then the
PandaDoc will be created. Once the pandadoc is created both site record address properties will need to be shown on the document.
<@U03GQLR1049> There's a custom object API. I've been using it for many things and I think it has most if not all the functionalities as any other object API
I've set a lot of stuff on custom code workflows too because you will realize the UI is limited when it comes to custom objects but you can always find workarounds I think
Anyone have experience routing Esri ArcGis with HubSpot? Working in local dev now trying to connect it to HubSpot Landing Page :the_horns::skin-tone-3:

Hello everyone! I'm trying to retrieve performance information about my marketing emails, beyond that, I want to know which workflows each email is associated with. So far, I managed to find this <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/cms_email/get-all-marketing-email-statistics|endpoint>, but I'm missing my second demand. Can anyone help?

You can loop through workflows and see if the email you are searching for is included on any step.
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/workflows/v3/get_workflows>
Hey is there any option to make any field as read only in HubSpot, i want to make read only field of contact of email. how can i make this please guide me <@U02CUFSCXHQ>
